dcterms:creator: A. H. Shoeb
dcterms:description: The CHB-MIT scalp EEG database is a widely used dataset for benchmarking seizure detection algorithms, containing recordings from pediatric patients with intractable epilepsy.
dcterms:title: CHB-MIT scalp EEG database

dcterms:description: The Boston Children’s Hospital (CHB)-MIT scalp EEG database is a publicly available dataset that includes recordings from pediatric patients with intractable epilepsy, used for benchmarking seizure detection algorithms.
dcterms:title: Boston Children’s Hospital (CHB)-MIT scalp electroencephalography (EEG) database
